dmca.title: copyright infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Danny Greer - CPi [mailto:danny@cpi-syndication.com] 
Sent: Thursday, May 24, 2007 3:06 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: copyright infringement

 

You have images of Kristin Cavallari by Douglas Bizarro and Elizabeth
Moss published on your website at
http://gossipword.com/celebrity-gossips/kristin-cavallaris-photoshopped-
beach-photoshoot.html <http://poponthepop.com/?page_id=1127> 
Since I am the photographers agent responsible for licensing rights to
these images I can say I have a good faith belief that use of the 
copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web
pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

I look forward to hearing from you immediately.

Faithfully,





Danny Greer

Creative Photographers inc.

444 Park Avenue South

Suite 502

New York, NY 10016

Direct Tel: (212) 500-0913

www: http://www.cpi-syndication.com <http://www.cpi-syndication.com/>
